title: Apply for On-Campus Housing
description: A newly admitted student wants to apply for on-campus housing for their first year.

tasks.description: Verify the student's admission status and eligibility for housing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the student has been admitted and is eligible.

tasks.description: Guide the student to the online housing application portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the correct URL and explains the application steps.

tasks.description: Explain the different housing options (e.g., dorm styles, meal plans) and the lottery process.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the housing options and how assignments are made.
